Manx: She boght ta’n verchys nagh vel, feoïltagh dooie,
English: All worth is poor, unless with generous skill

Manx: Son rheïn lesh sollagh’-laue yn tôrtys yeeasit;
English: The liberal hand the trusted gift impart;

Manx: Annoon tan phooar nagh vod yn aigney loobey,
English: All power is weak that doth not curb the will,

Manx: Dagh schleï fardail nagh vel minjeal y cree.
English: All science vain that does not mend the heart.
